title: Bug 6410: File marked as dirty by code assist even when it is unchanged
description: Bug 6410: File marked as dirty by code assist even when it is unchanged
OB: When using code assist (CtrlSpace) in a Java file, the file is marked as dirty (unsaved changes) even though it has not been changed. Additionally, the code assist menu does not appear.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.

2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.

3. For example, consider the following code:

   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);

   Place the cursor inside the parenthesis after the 'method' keyword.

4. Press CtrlSpace to trigger code assist.

Note: Verify that the code assist menu does not appear and the file is marked as dirty even though it has not been changed.
